links.title: Google's E-Commerce Plans Are in Question as Executive Departures Mount
links.description: A year ago, Google's commerce initiatives finally seemed to be clicking. Its same-day delivery service, Google Express, was a hit with consumers in San Francisco and its business selling paid product ads in search was, by most accounts, a big success with big retailers. How quickly things change.
